proyecto1.name: El Nuevo Manantial
proyecto1.p1: To boost a growing family business, I identified the critical need to digitize its operations. The manual ordering system via social media and paper created disorganization, limited growth, and consumed valuable time. The challenge was to build a technological solution that was both robust and easy for the family and their customers to use.
proyecto1.p2: I developed a custom full-stack web application that centralizes the entire sales cycle. The platform allows customers—both registered and guests—to place orders intuitively, while administrators manage everything from an operational dashboard designed for fast and efficient decision-making.
proyecto1.p3: The result is a tool that not only drastically optimized management time but also improved the customer experience and established the foundation for scalable growth. This project demonstrates my ability to understand a business need, design a complete solution, and execute it using modern technologies to create a product with direct, measurable impact.
proyecto1.li1: Intelligent Ordering Platform with real-time pricing and a frictionless checkout flow.
proyecto1.li2: Centralized Operations Dashboard with sales metrics, filters, order management, and inventory control.
proyecto1.li3: Authentication & Roles System using NextAuth.js, ensuring secure customer/admin access.
proyecto1.li4: Modern Full-Stack Architecture built with Next.js, Prisma, and Supabase.
proyecto1.imgAlt: Preview of El Nuevo Manantial project

proyecto2.name: Inmobiliaria TerraNova
proyecto2.subtitulo: End-to-end solution for real estate sales and management
proyecto2.p1: I developed a high-performance web platform designed to modernize the operations of a rural and urban real estate agency. The goal was to surpass traditional website limitations and create a digital ecosystem that works as a sales-closing tool.
proyecto2.p2: The application merges an SEO-optimized public portal with a powerful CRM Admin Dashboard. Built with Next.js 15 and Supabase, I implemented Row Level Security for granular permission control between Admins and Agents.
proyecto2.p3: The system transforms the workflow: it automatically captures leads from the website, assigns them to agents, and allows detailed follow-up through internal notes and statuses.
proyecto2.li1: Integrated Sales CRM with lead pipeline, internal notes chat, and reassignment system.
proyecto2.li2: RBAC Security Architecture with advanced team and permission management.
proyecto2.li3: Technical SEO: JSON-LD, OpenGraph, image optimization and instant routing.
proyecto2.li4: Conversion Tools: WhatsApp integration, interactive satellite maps, and visit counter.
proyecto2.imgAlt: Preview of the TerraNova Real Estate project

proyecto3.name: CheCancha
proyecto3.subtitulo: The SaaS platform that modernizes court reservations
proyecto3.p1: CheCancha was born as 'Courtify', my final individual project at Soy Henry’s Full-Stack Bootcamp. The challenge was to build a complete application from scratch that solved a real market problem.
proyecto3.p2: I detected that most sports complexes relied on informal and chaotic methods to manage reservations (notebooks, WhatsApp, etc.). The goal was to create a modern and organized platform.
proyecto3.p3: From day one, usability was the focus for both administrators and players. The platform lays the foundations for a scalable SaaS business that can transform the sports industry.
proyecto3.li1: Intuitive Admin Dashboard with interactive calendar and real-time occupancy.
proyecto3.li2: Player Portal with social login, booking history and personal data control.
proyecto3.li3: Automated Email Notifications for confirmations, reminders, and updates.
proyecto3.li4: Mercado Pago Payment Integration for deposits and full payments.

proyecto4.imgAlt: Preview of Club Atlético Tostado project

proyecto5.name: APEX Bikes E-commerce
proyecto5.p1: Designed and developed a niche e-commerce for high-end bicycles, focused on a premium and minimalist user experience. The platform not only manages a complex catalog with color and size variants but also integrates a hybrid business model combining new product sales with used bike trade-ins.
proyecto5.p2: The architecture is built on Next.js 15 for maximum speed. It includes a smart filtering system (by style, brand, and price), dynamic pricing logic that calculates bank transfer discounts and installment plans in real-time, and a 'Garage' module with complex form validation for bike appraisals.
proyecto5.p3: The checkout process was optimized into a 'One Page Checkout' to reduce friction, integrating stock validation and shipping calculations. The visual design prioritizes product photography and clarity in technical information.
proyecto5.li1: Dynamic Filters & Search: Navigation by subcategories (MTB, Road, Urban) and styles.
proyecto5.li2: Local Financial Logic: Automatic price calculation for bank transfer discounts (-15%) and installments.
proyecto5.li3: APEX Garage Module: Multi-step form with Zod validation for used bike quotes.
proyecto5.li4: Variant Management: Visual color selectors and interactive image galleries.
proyecto5.imgAlt: Preview of the tech e-commerce project

proyecto7.name: RedditoBooks
proyecto7.subtitulo: A modern digital identity for a growing accounting firm
proyecto7.p1: RedditoBooks is a Miami-based accounting firm that needed a professional, modern and trustworthy landing page to strengthen its presence in the U.S. market. The goal was to create an elegant, high-impact site that clearly communicated expertise, reliability and value to potential clients.
proyecto7.p2: I designed a dark, minimalist interface with precise typography, verified testimonials and clear conversion-focused sections. The project was built with the latest Next.js architecture, including server components, image optimization, dynamic OpenGraph rendering and JSON-LD structured data for improved SEO performance.
proyecto7.p3: The final result is a fast, polished landing page with a strong visual narrative that builds trust. The website is optimized for lead acquisition and prepared to scale into educational content or future CRM integrations.
proyecto7.li1: Modern and elegant design: Dark theme, clean hierarchy, and conversion-focused layout.
proyecto7.li2: Next.js modern architecture: Server components, high performance, and technical SEO structure.
proyecto7.li3: Advanced corporate SEO: Refined metadata, custom OpenGraph, JSON-LD schema and multilanguage sitemap.
proyecto7.li4: Testimonials and social proof: Real client feedback presented in a professional, trust-driven format.

proyecto8.name: Iñaqui Techos
proyecto8.subtitulo: A renewed digital presence for a leading roofing materials company.
proyecto8.p1: Iñaqui Techos is an Argentine company with over 25 years of experience selling metal shingles, asphalt slates, and premium roofing materials. I joined the project through Ontide Marketing, who needed a complete overhaul of their website: the previous WordPress version was broken, insecure, and nearly unusable due to a permanent loader caused by update errors and installation issues.
proyecto8.p2: My challenge was to transform an outdated, identity-less website into a modern, clear, and trustworthy platform. I researched the company's competitors, analyzed their international suppliers, and designed a visual identity based on bold typography, strong layout structures, and the strategic use of the brand’s intense colors. The new website prioritizes user experience, straightforward navigation, and a professional presentation of each product line.
proyecto8.p3: The result was a fast, solid, and fully modernized corporate site that truly reflects the company’s level and trajectory. Iñaqui Techos regained its digital presence, improved its commercial communication, and now has an online tool that supports its growth and professionalism. The client was extremely satisfied with the transformation compared to the previous website.
proyecto8.li1: Complete visual identity redesign: impactful titles, strategic colors, and a modern, industrial-inspired style.
proyecto8.li2: Full site optimization: removal of critical errors, improved security, and a stable structure for smooth navigation.
proyecto8.li3: Professional display of product lines: Tilcor, Verona, and IKO with high-quality images and clear segmentation.
proyecto8.li4: Conversion-focused structure: clear calls to action, prioritized contact options, and commercial-driven layout.
